title: Trend Micro Worry-Free Business Security Link Following Denial-of-Service Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to create a denial-of-service condition on affected installations of Trend Micro Worry-Free Business Security. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the Trend Micro Security Agent Listener service. By creating a symbolic link, an attacker can abuse the service to overwrite a file. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to create a denial-of-service condition on the system.
addtionnal_details: Trend Micro has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://success.trendmicro.com/solution/000289996
timeline:
2021-08-18 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2022-01-06 - Coordinated public release of advisory
credit: Michael DePlante (@izobashi) of Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative
